ResearchProjectDef.label: 127mm SK C/34
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned 12.7cm SK C/34 Naval gun with manual loading mechanisms. Uses the German 12.7cm SprGr Shell. 14 Seconds reload time. 10m Min Range, 150m Max Range. Cannot shoot over walls. Consumes 200W of power for its electric-powered aiming controls. Explodes with radius of 2 blocks when destroyed. Because of the size, this turret cant be placed under a roof. With this turret you can build a wall between the colonist and the turret to protect the colonist.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 150mm KC/36

Can fire over walls. Consumes 300W of power for its electric-powered aiming controls. Explodes with radius of 3 blocks when destroyed. Because of the size, this turret can't be placed under a roof. ResearchProjectDef.label: Double 127mm Type 5
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned Double mounted 12.7cm Type 5 Naval gun. It has an automatic ammunition feeder system that takes the ammunitions from an ammunition storage, the storage can hold 80 shells. Fires a salvo of 2 shells with 14 seconds reload time. Consumes 1900W of power for its electric-powered aiming controls and loading systems, 15m min range, 250m max range. Able to fire over walls. Explodes with radius of 4 blocks when destroyed. Because of the size and its ability to do high angle aiming, this turret cant be placed under a roof. With this turret you can build a wall between the colonist and the turret to protect the colonist.
